QuestData.Title: Cookies and Cream
QuestData.Description:
Thank you for helping me collect everything.
I couldn't let you go out there and battle those mean ettins on an empty stomach. Now, I would be no better than those terrible monsters if I did that, would I?
$p, you just feel free to take a load off while I make you a fresh batch of cookies and some warm milk!
QuestData.LogDescription: Enjoy Marie's fresh baked cookies and milk.
QuestData.RewardText: What did you think $n, hit the spot, don't they?
